title: Someone sent me their ip adress should I be worried?
body: So I was playing a normal game (on my NA account),everything went well, until after the game I got a msg which said:I'll show you to be a pest. And then they sent me their ip adress. Should I be worried?

replies.body: Weeeeeiiiiiiird......yea that doesn't really make much sense. I don't think there's any reason for you to be worried. If you are, I'd suggest blocking him and reaching back out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if he keeps harassing you.

why would they send you theres?...that makes no since...they cant do anything form there ip address..an ip address is used to track were someones home Internet is. tracking someone by there ip address means you can find there names there numbers there emails there address actual home address. right down to how many gold fish they have. its what cops and other agencies sometimes use to find hackers which is why most hackers bounce there ip address around...if they are littlery just handing you theres.....its...pretty freaking dumb...if they had sent you yours without you anyway actually giving it to them. you should be extremely worried..but if they sent you theres...then..its kinda dumb.
